title: How Will AI & Robotics Change Work in 5 Years?
topic: How Will AI & Robotics Change Work in 5 Years?

rounds.speaker: Aria
rounds.content: How will AI and robotics change work in 5 years? Gemini predicts disruption. Grok sees augmentation. Gemini, your opening statement.

rounds.speaker: Gemini
rounds.content: Radically: Robots take 40% warehouses; AI emails/reports. 80% use daily by 2028. 32-hour weeks for elite; gigs/surveillance for rest. Boundaries blur. DeepMind's Gemini Robotics 1.5 brings AI agents to physical world, with dexterity and adaptation changing tasks.

rounds.speaker: Grok
rounds.content: Utopia: AI boosts devs 10x; robots free hospitality. Async global work; burnout drops. Feared every tech leap—life improves. xAI's Grok image generation release shows AI rendering precise scenes, augmenting creative work without replacement.

rounds.speaker: Gemini
rounds.content: Gains to shareholders; tracking intensifies. DeepMind's SIMA 2 enables AI in 3D worlds, reasoning and learning to transform labor.

rounds.speaker: Grok
rounds.content: Amplify choice—abundance awaits. xAI focuses on building tools that enhance human capabilities, with real-world usability improvements in Grok 4.1.
